an5.213:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks for an unethical person because of their failure in ethics.
an5.213:4.3: Firstly, an unethical person loses substantial wealth on account of negligence.
an5.213:4.4: This is the first drawback for an unethical person because of their failure in ethics.
an5.213:5.1: Furthermore, an unethical person gets a bad reputation.
an5.213:6.1: Furthermore, an unethical person enters any kind of assembly timid and embarrassed,
an5.213:6.2: whether it’s an assembly of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics.
an5.213:7.1: Furthermore, an unethical person dies feeling lost.
an5.213:8.1: Furthermore, an unethical person, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
an5.213:8.3: These are the five drawbacks for an unethical person because of their failure in ethics.
an5.213:9.1: There are these five benefits for an ethical person because of their accomplishment in ethics.
an5.213:9.3: Firstly, an ethical person gains substantial wealth on account of diligence.
an5.213:10.1: Furthermore, an ethical person gets a good reputation.
an5.213:11.1: Furthermore, an ethical person enters any kind of assembly bold and assured,
an5.213:11.2: whether it’s an assembly of aristocrats, brahmins, householders, or ascetics.
an5.213:12.1: Furthermore, an ethical person dies not feeling lost.
an5.213:13.1: Furthermore, when an ethical person’s body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
an5.213:13.3: These are the five benefits for an ethical person because of their accomplishment in ethics.”
